summary: 该接口用于删除RDS实例的数据备份文件。

schema.description:
备份集ID。可通过接口DescribeBackups查询。多组值以英文逗号（,）隔开，单次最多传入100个。
>仅支持删除DescribeBackups中**StoreStatus**为**Enabled**的备份集。

400.errorMessage: The operation is not permitted due to type of the instance.
Must input at least one optional parameter
Delete backup set number is more than 100.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

403.errorMessage: Current DB instance state does not support this operation.
Current DB instance engine and type does not support operations.
Current DB Instance character_type does not support this operation.
The Specified backup does not support this operation.

404.errorMessage: Current DB instance lock mode does not support this operation.
Specified backup set ID does not exist.

title: 删除实例数据备份文件
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
> 仅支持高可用版本实例。

### 功能说明
调用该接口删除数据备份文件只删除实例自身的备份集，不会删除所关联实例（只读、灾备、克隆等）的备份集。

### 注意事项
调用该接口时，实例必须满足以下条件，否则将操作失败：
- 实例状态为运行中；
- 如果日志备份已关闭，RDS实例不支持按时间点恢复功能。此时您可以删除已生成超过7天的任意数据备份文件；
- 如果日志备份已开启，且日志备份保留时间小于数据备份保留时间，则超过日志备份保留时间的数据备份文件可以删除。
